torpedo.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a long narrow weapon that is fired under the surface of the sea and explodes when it hits something
torpedo.translation[1].definitions[0].de: to attack or destroy a ship with a torpedo
torpedo.translation[1].definitions[1].de: to stop something such as a plan from succeeding
torpedo.translation[1].definitions[1].ex: New threats of violence have effectively torpedoed the peace talks.
